item.nzh-sem:metakeywords: Far North District, Bay of Islands, Property, Residential Property, Property Investment, Northern Advocate, The Country, Business
item.title: Foreign buyer rules force US couple to sell exclusive waterfront property for massive loss
item.description:
A wealthy American couple have been forced to sell an exclusive waterfront property for a massive loss after breaching foreign buyer rules designed to protect sensitive Kiwi land.
New York fund manager ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

item.title: Inside the deadly Rosewood rest home cluster
item.description: It was the worst-case scenario that health officials were dreading â€“ the deadly coronavirus entering a rest home. The ten deaths at Christchurch rest home Rosewood now accounts for the deadliest cluster ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/davidmeates_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Canterbury District Health Board (CDHB) chief executive David Meates.
https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/simonwallace_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=New Zealand Aged Care Association (NZACA) chief executive Simon Wallace.
https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/rosewoodsign_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=There have been ten deaths at the Christchurch rest home.
https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/rosewoodbernardpope_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Bernard Pope was a Rosewood resident where a coronavirus cluster has broken out.

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/mikekyne_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Former police officer Mike Kyne has been working as an advocate for Rosewood owners Malcolm and Lynda Tucker.

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/BXCZJWPQXRD5TH3RAUIAOWEFLQ_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern said the Rosewood deaths were a "sad and sobering reminder of the need to stay the course".

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/060420NZHKBRosewood2_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Ambulances transported 20 residents from Rosewood Rest Home & Hospitals in Christchurch on April 6 as a coronavirus cluster was confirmed. Photo / Kurt Bayer

item.title: Secrets of PM's Covid-19 response: Helen Clark death stare and invaluable First Man
